directions.step:
In large saucepan, cover onions and lemon rind with water; bring to boil and boil for 5 minutes. Drain; refresh under cold running water and drain again. Discard rind. Peel onions and arrange in 13 x 9 inch casserole dish; pour olive oil over.
Bake, uncovered in 375=F8F oven, basting occasionally, for 40 minutes. Add port, vinegar, raisins, sugar, and pepper to taste. Bake for 30 minutes longer or until juices are syrupy. Makes 12 servings. Source: Canadian Living Magazine ch. Posted to MM-Recipes Digest V3 #279
